qas.question: What did the State Council establish in 2008?
How long did the plan last?
What did the state council set up in 2008?
What is the basis for this plan?

answers.text: one province to one affected county

qas.question: How long is the plan due to last?
What is the cost per province's budget?

context: In 2008, State Council established <a0_0>a <a2_0>counterpart support plan<a2_0/><a0_0/> (《汶川地震灾后恢复重建对口支援方案》). The plan is to arrange 19 eastern and central province and municipalitie to help 18 counties, on "<a3_0>one province to one affected county<a3_0/>" basis. The plan spanned <a1_0><a4_0>3 years<a4_0/><a1_0/>, and cost no less than <a5_0>one percent<a5_0/> of the province or municipality's budget.
